document.masterDocTitle: Molecular systematics and morphological identification of the cryptic species of the genus Acalles Schoenherr, 1825, with descriptions of new species (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Cryptorhynchinae)

subSubSection.paragraph: Species included in the molecular analysis are printed in bold. l.t. = country or island containing the type locality

TREE 1 .
(upper part): Bayesian consensus tree ( 50 % majority rule) for CO 1 and 16 S, numbers at branches indicate Bayesian posterior probability (BPP) values, lower values than 100 have been deleted for better readability. New World Cryptorhynchinae contain specimens from Canada , Mexico and USA . Species names are followed by Collector´s no and ZFMK-Biobank number, former species names are provided in brackets.
